transcript: the one thing that can guarantee that you don't get to where you want to go is that people think you're a liar a lot of marketing from a lot of people is exaggeration to the point of like it not being true there's a difference between describing the benefits and outright lying you want to make sure that you're describing things that are true one of our big things in marketing in general is State the facts and tell the truth I don't think I can sell this if I just State the facts and tell the truth well then let's keep working on it until the facts and the truth do the selling for us and then when that's true we launch it
